item.title: @elonmusk: 10 TIMES NVIDIA To put 100 GW/per year of AI computers in perspective, Grok estimates Nvidia is pres...
item.description: 10 TIMES NVIDIA To put 100 GW/per year of AI computers in perspective, Grok estimates Nvidia is presently at 10GW/per year in AI compute. IE 10X Nvidia. 100 TRILLION COMPANY Now you see why Elon Musk says a 100 Trillion market cap company may be possible within 10 years. SpaceX, xAI and Tesla will all play major roles in AI Space Compute.

item.title: @elonmusk: Grok‚Äôs video generation limits crush the competition. SuperGrok (Premium+/equivalent) gives you 100‚Äì...
item.description: Grok‚Äôs video generation limits crush the competition. SuperGrok (Premium+/equivalent) gives you 100‚Äì200 videos/day ‚Äî hundreds more than Google‚Äôs plans. SuperGrok Heavy pushes it to 500‚Äì1000 videos/day. Google? Severely restricted: ‚Ä¢Google AI Pro: ~3 videos/day (Veo 3.1 Fast preview) ‚Ä¢Google AI Ultra: ~5 videos/day (Veo 3.1 preview) Grok lets creators go wild without rationing ‚Äî single digits vs. hundreds/thousands. Night and day difference. üöÄ

item.title: @elonmusk: Elon is explaining how AI systems in space can handle "bit flips" (errors from cosmic radiation, aka...
item.description: Elon is explaining how AI systems in space can handle "bit flips" (errors from cosmic radiation, aka Single Event Upsets). Large neural nets are resilient due to built-in noise tolerance. For critical, deterministic code like the OS, they use redundancy like triple-voting to ensure accuracy.

item.title: @elonmusk: China electricity generation is still growing super fast, with solar being the largest incremental c...
item.description: China electricity generation is still growing super fast, with solar being the largest incremental contributor, and will exceed America by a factor of 3X either this year or next

item.title: @elonmusk: The US continues to fall behind China. We have to go all in on solar + batteries with nuclear for so...
item.description: The US continues to fall behind China. We have to go all in on solar + batteries with nuclear for some special cases. Energy is a measure of the work being done.

item.title: @elonmusk: Of course. They are trying to deflect responsibility to me from the truly guilty. I have NOT been to...
item.description: Of course. They are trying to deflect responsibility to me from the truly guilty. I have NOT been to any of Epstein‚Äôs party, his plane or his island. But many others have. Those who have committed serious crimes need to be prosecuted.
